mapper.select: select review.*, member.id as member_id, member.name, movie.id as movie_id, movie.title as movie_title from review inner join member on review.member_id = member.id inner join movie on review.movie_id = movie.id

select review.*, member.id as member_id, member.name, movie.id as movie_id, movie.title as movie_title from review inner join member on review.member_id = member.id inner join movie on review.movie_id = movie.id where review.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into review(movie_id, member_id, title, content, image) values (#{movieId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image})
